Name: Waist Beam Cannon
Description: Fire at eneimies using the forward-facing dual beam cannons stowed on your waist.

Name: Composite Shield Booster
Description: Transform your shield into a rifle, blade, and claw to carry out a flurry of attacks. Raise Melee and Shot Attack of your Squad by 24%.

Name: Micro Missile
Description: Fire micro missiles from pods in your shoulders.

Name: Homing Missile & Machine Cannon
Description: Spray homing missiles from the launcher pods on your legs.

Name: Cotton
Description: Expel the cotton in your body from your mouth, entangling hit enemies for a set period of time

Name: Hyper Mode
Description: Enter Hyper Mode for enhanced combat prowess. Raise speed by 20%. Raise your Melee Attack by 19%. Raise your Melee Defense by 19%.

Name: Sekiha Tenkyo Burning Finger
Description: Create a humongous fist with Sekiha Tenkyoken energy and crush enemies in your grasp. Raise speed of your Squad by 20% Raise Melee Attack of your Squad by 39%.

Name: Bakunetsu Burning Slash
Description: Concentrate your energy into a Burning Slash and unleash a high-powered three-strike attack.

Name: Imitation Houou Haoh-Ken
Description: Copy a Kamiki Gunpla Style technique to make a beast-shaped strike with blazing, violet arms. Squad recovers 48% of maximum Armor. Raise Melee Attack of your Squad by 29%.

Name: Burning Burst System
Description: Maximize particle emissions from your Gunpla to temporarily boost its capabilities. Raise your speed by 20%. Raise your Melee Attack by 39%.

Name: Heat Rush
Description: Execute a rush attack with the beam swords on your forearms.

Name: Pristis Beam Reamer
Description: Launch a beam from the experimental DRAGOON System on your waist.

Name: Composite Armed Shield System
Description: Launch rapid-fire beams from your shield. You can move while firing.

Name: Double Saber Shear
Description: Cleave through enemies with sabers in each hand.

Name: Brand Marker
Description: Unleash a barrage of attacks with two beam sabers extending from your brass knuckles.

Name: Skull Heart Shot
Description: Launch a combo attack using the daggers in your soles against an enemy restrained by your scissor anchors. Squad recovers 48% of maximum Armor.

Name: Peacock Smasher
Description: Fire eight beams, splayed out like the feathers of a peacock, from your rifle.

Name: Dragon Fang
Description: Unleash a burst of flame at enemies ahead of you from your dragon-shaped arm.

Name: Twin Blade Attack
Description: Unleash a barrage of attacks with your twin blades.

Name: Beam Cannon
Description: Fire beams from your arm beam cannons and the long blade on your shoulder unit.

Name: RG Double Build Knuckles
Description: Gather power from the RG System into your fist to hammer enemies with powerful punches.

Name: Star Funnels
Description: Form Discharge System particle bits and attack with your Plavsky-Power-Gate-bypassing saber.

Name: Star Beam Cannon
Description: Fire at enemies using the dual beam cannons stowed on your waist. Raise your speed by 20%.

Name: Discharge System [Rifle Mode]
Description: Fill your rifle with Plavsky Particles and fire a powerful, Plavsky-Power-Gate-bypassing beam.

Name: Absorb Shield
Description: Deploy your shield to temporarily mitigate damage from beam attacks. Raise your Beam Resist by 100%. Your Gunpla resists flinching for a set period of time.

Name: Brinicle & Prominence
Description: Modify Plavsky Particles to wield fire in your right hand and ice in your left, and attack. Raise speed of your Squad by 20%. Raise Melee Attack of your Squad by 29%. Raise Shot Defense of your Squad by 19%.

Name: Dark Matter Blades
Description: Attach Dark Matter Booster wings yo your arms and carve up enemies with your keen blades. Raise your Melee Attack by 24%.

Name: M106 Amfortas Plasma Beam Cannon
Description: Attack enemies ahead by firing highly compressed plasma energy from your Plasma Beam Cannon.
